How to Be Rich: A Four Part Series by Pastor Andy Stanley of Northpoint Community Church

Most of us spend our entire lives trying to get rich, and yet we never stop to consider how to be rich. Enticed by our culture, we focus so much on achieving an ever-increasing standard of living that we never realize when, in fact, we become rich.
